post.description: Take this action to request a tenant scoped bearer token. Once you receive a tenant scoped bearer token, it is valid for 24 hours.

parameters.description: The Content-Type header specifies the media type of the request payload (request body).
parameters.name: Content-Type

access_token.description: Bearer token for further access to the API.

200.description: Successful Tenant Scoped Auth Token Response

grant_type.description: OAuth 2.0 grant_type. The only supported value at this time is client_credentials.

post.summary: Request a Tenant Scoped Bearer Token

post.description: Create an Account Owner to link with accounts in TaxBit's system. By default, you can use this API at 50 requests per second (RPS). If your use case requires a higher RPS, please contact your Implementation Manager.

taxbit_id.title: TaxBitId
taxbit_id.description: The TaxBit ID for this object. This is a version 4 UUID.

date_created.description: The date when the account owner was created in TaxBit's system.

birth_date.description: ISO-8601 date when the Account Owner was born.

tax_country_code.description: Country the Account Owner is subject to taxes。

prefers_physical_mail.description: Whether the Account Owner's tax forms will be sent through physical mail instead of electronically. Defaults to false.

birth_city.description: The name of the city where the Account Owner was born.

birth_country.description: The name of the country where the Account Owner was born.

vat_country_code.description: The country code associated with the Account Owner's VAT identification number, indicating the country where the VAT is registered.

vat_id.description: The identification number assigned to the Account Owner's business for Value Added Tax (VAT) purposes by the relevant tax authority.

business_registration_country_code.description: Country code representing the location where the Account Owner's business is officially registered.

business_registration_number.description: The official registration number assigned to the Account Owner's business by the country where it is registered.

financial_account_id.description: A unique identifier assigned to the Account Owner's financial account.

financial_account_holder_name.description: The name of the individual or entity that holds the financial account associated with the Account Owner.

id.title: AccountOwnerId
id.description: Your system's unique identifier for the Account Owner.

birth_date.description: ISO-8601 date when the Account Owner was born.

tax_country_code.description: Country the Account Owner is subject to taxes。

first_line.description: First line of Account Owner's address.

second_line.description: Second line of Account Owner's address.

prefers_physical_mail.description: Whether the Account Owner's tax forms will be sent through physical mail instead of electronically. Defaults to false.

birth_city.description: The name of the city where the Account Owner was born.

birth_country.description: The name of the country where the Account Owner was born.

vat_country_code.description: The country code associated with the Account Owner's VAT identification number, indicating the country where the VAT is registered.

vat_id.description: The identification number assigned to the Account Owner's business for Value Added Tax (VAT) purposes by the relevant tax authority.

business_registration_country_code.description: Country code representing the location where the Account Owner's business is officially registered.

business_registration_number.description: The official registration number assigned to the Account Owner's business by the country where it is registered.

financial_account_id.description: A unique identifier assigned to the Account Owner's financial account.

financial_account_holder_name.description: The name of the individual or entity that holds the financial account associated with the Account Owner.

post.description: Submits complete and clean W-9, W-8BEN, or W-8BEN-E data for an Account Owner. Each submission is immutable.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Your system's unique identifier for the Account Owner

document_type.description: The document type of the collected tax documentation data

name.description: The legal name of the beneficial owner of the account

dba_name.description: The "doing business as" (DBA) or "disregarded entity" (DRE) name

tax_classification.description: The federal tax classification of name; if tax_classification != OTHER, other_tax_classification must be empty

other_tax_classification.description: The tax classification not listed; if tax_classification = OTHER, this field is required

exempt_payee_code.description: The code used to identify payees who are exempt from backup withholding

exempt_fatca_code.description: The code used to identify payees who are exempt from FATCA reporting

first_line.description: The first line of name's address; this field is optional if a user has country or stateOrProvince set as UM.

second_line.description: The second line of name's address

city.description: The city of name; this field is optional if a user has country or stateOrProvince set as UM.

state_or_province.description: The state or province of name; this field is optional if a user does not have any of the following country: PR, MP, GU, AS, VI, UM, US, or CA.

postal_code.description: The postal code of name; if country = US, this field must be 5 or 9 digits; if country = CA, this field must be in "LNLNLN", "LNL NLN", or "LNL-NLN" format; this field is optional if a user does not have any of the following country or stateOrProvince: PR, MP, GU, AS, VI, UM, US, or CA.

tin.description: The U.S. tax identification number (TIN) associated with the name; the TIN must consist of 9 numerical digits, must not be sequential or repeating, must not begin with five zeros, and must not contain any alphabetic characters

tin_type.description: The type of US tax identification number; if tax_classification = INDIVIDUAL, tin_type must be SSN, ITIN, or ATIN - else, tin_type must be EIN

has_certified.description: The user has certified under penalties of perjury all necessary certifications

is_not_subject_backup_withholding.description: The user has certified that they are not subject to backup withholding

signature.description: The signed name of signor (i.e., individual authorized to sign for name); if tax_classification = INDIVIDUAL, signature must equal name

signature_timestamp.description: The date and time when the form was signed; the timestamp must be within 24 hours of the current UTC time

document_type.description: The document type of the collected tax documentation data

name.description: The legal name of the beneficial owner of the account

reference_numbers.description: The legal name of the US or foreign “disregarded entity” (DRE) owner

tax_classification.description: The federal tax classification of name

country.description: The country of citizenship of name; country must not be US

first_line.description: The first line of name's permanent address; this field is optional if a user has country or stateOrProvince set as UM.

second_line.description: The second line of name's permanent address

city.description: The city of name; this field is optional if a user has country or stateOrProvince set as UM.

state_or_province.description: The state or province of name; this field is optional if a user does not have any of the following country: PR, MP, GU, AS, VI, UM, US, or CA.

postal_code.description: The postal code of name; if country = US, this field must be 5 or 9 digits; if country = CA, this field must be in "LNLNLN", "LNL NLN", or "LNL-NLN" format; this field is optional if a user does not have any of the following country or stateOrProvince: PR, MP, GU, AS, VI, UM, US, or CA.

permanent_address.description: The permanent residence address of name

first_line.description: The first line of name's mailing address; this field is optional if a user has country or stateOrProvince set as UM.

second_line.description: The second line of name's mailing address

city.description: The city of name; this field is optional if a user has country or stateOrProvince set as UM.

state_or_province.description: The state or province of name; this field is optional if a user does not have any of the following country: PR, MP, GU, AS, VI, UM, US, or CA.

postal_code.description: The postal code of name; if country = US, this field must be 5 or 9 digits; if country = CA, this field must be in "LNLNLN", "LNL NLN", or "LNL-NLN" format; this field is optional if a user does not have any of the following country or stateOrProvince: PR, MP, GU, AS, VI, UM, US, or CA.

tin.description: The U.S. tax identification number (TIN) associated with the name; the TIN must consist of 9 numerical digits, must not be sequential or repeating, must not begin with five zeros, and must not contain any alphabetic characters

ftin.description: The foreign tax identification number (“FTIN”) of name

ftin_not_legally_required.description: The user has indicated that they are legally not required to provide a FTIN; if false, FTIN is required

date_of_birth.description: The date of birth of name; age must be between 0-130

has_certified.description: The user has certified under penalties of perjury all necessary certifications

signature.description: The signed name of signor (i.e., individual authorized to sign for name); signature must equal name

signature_timestamp.description: The date and time when the form was signed; the timestamp must be within 24 hours of the current UTC time

document_type.description: The document type of the collected tax documentation data

name.description: The legal name of the beneficial owner of the account

reference_numbers.description: The legal name of the US or foreign “disregarded entity” (DRE) owner

tax_classification.description: The federal tax classification of name

country.description: The country in which the business or organization is legally registered or incorporated; this must be a country other than the United States

post.description: Create accounts associated with an account owner in TaxBit's system. Accounts enable sending transactions, accessing inventory details, and retrieving tax-related documents associated with these accounts.

date_created.description: The date when the account was created in TaxBit's system.

date_modified.description: The date when the account was last modified in TaxBit's system.

establishment_date.description: ISO-8601 date when the account was established.

secondary_account_owner_ids.description: A list of additional (secondary) account owner IDs associated with the account.

message.example: Object with id <value> cannot be found

id.title: AccountId
id.description: ID of the Account. This is the ID in the TaxBit client's source system.

establishment_date.description: ISO-8601 date when the account was established.

disposition_method.title: DispositionMethod
disposition_method.description: The disposition method for the account. Supported disposition methods are HIFO, FIFO, and LIFO.

secondary_account_owner_ids.description: A list of additional (secondary) account owner IDs associated with the account.

patch.description: Update an Account's data using your system's unique identifier for the Account.

parameters.description: Your system's unique identifier for the Account
parameters.name: id

payer_id.title: PayerId
payer_id.description: The Payer/Filer UUID. This is a version 4 UUID.

establishment_date.description: ISO-8601 date when the account was established.

year_end.description: Four digit year of the last tax year as of 12/31.

fair_market_value.description: The total US dollar value of assets within the account at year-end.

secondary_account_owner_ids.description: A list of additional (secondary) account owner IDs associated with the account.

get.description: Get Account data using your system's unique identifier for the Account.

parameters.description: Your system's unique identifier for the Account
parameters.name: id

get.description: Retrieve all transactions associated with a given account using your system's unique identifier for the Account.

parameters.description: Your system's unique identifier for the Account
parameters.name: id

parameters.description: A token used to indicate when to resume pagination of results. This is provided by the API in response to a previous request.
parameters.name: continuation_key

parameters.description: The number of transactions to include in each page of results returned by the API
parameters.name: page_size

parameters.description: The date to indicate when to begin the search for transactions, specified in the ISO-8601 date format. If a date is not provided, the search will begin from the earliest available transaction
parameters.name: start_date

parameters.description: The date to indicate when to end the search for transactions, specified in the ISO-8601 date format. If a date is not provided, the search will continue until the most recent transaction
parameters.name: end_date

parameters.description: Determines the sorting order of the transactions by date. Use '-date' for descending order or '+date' for ascending order. The default response is in descending order
parameters.name: sort_by

get.description: Get the cost bases for the resulting gain items from a disposition (e.g. SELL) transaction ID.

parameters.description: The Form Data Type (Ex. 8949).
parameters.name: form

parameters.description: The TaxBit UUID of the transaction.
parameters.name: id

parameters.description: User's TaxBit UUID.
parameters.name: x-user-id

parameters.description: UUID for the Fiat asset for tax calculations (i.e. USD).
parameters.name: fiat_asset_id

allOf.description: The cost of the asset sold.

sale_date.description: ISO-8601 formatted date when the asset was disposed.

tax_year.description: Tax Year that the Cost Basis was liquidated in.

200.description: Cost Basis Line Items for a Transaction.

post.description: Send (create or update) transactions to TaxBit using your system's unique identifier for the Transaction.

id.description: Your system's unique identifier for the Transaction

taxbit_id.description: TaxBit's internal identifier for the Transaction

account_id.description: Your system's unique identifier for the Account

taxbit_account_id.description: ID of the Account. This is the TaxBit ID.

datetime.description: ISO-8601 timestamp representing when the transaction occurred.

version.description: the version of TaxBit Transaction Data Model (TDM) JSON used for this transaction. The current supported version is 2.0

get.description: Retrieve a transaction that was previously ingested by TaxBit using your system's unique identifier for the Transaction.

parameters.description: Your system's unique identifier for the Transaction
parameters.name: id

delete.description: Delete a transaction using your system's unique identifier.

parameters.description: Your system's unique identifier for the Transaction
parameters.name: id

get.description: Retrieve a summary of total income earned by a specific account using Account ID.

parameters.description: Your system's unique identifier for the Account
parameters.name: id

parameters.description: Only aggregate income transactions from this date-time and later (inclusive). This date cannot be earlier than Jan 1 of the previous year in UTC (e.g. 2023-01-01T00:00:00.000Z if it is currently any time in 2024). Use the ISO-8601 date-time format. Defaults to Jan 1 of the current year.
parameters.name: start_date

parameters.description: Only aggregate income transactions from before this date-time (exclusive). This date must be after start_date. Use the ISO-8601 date-time format. Defaults to the current time in UTC.
parameters.name: end_date

parameters.description: If provided, provides income aggregations rolled up into either month or year intervals. Only intervals with income transactions will be returned. If not provided, no roll ups are returned.
parameters.name: roll_up

totals.title: Income Totals
totals.description: Aggregations of Income Transactions for the requested time period

income.description: Total amount of income earned, in USD

fees.description: Total amount of fees paid on income transactions, in USD

items.title: Income Rollup
items.description: Aggregation of Income Transactions for a specific year or month

income.description: Total amount of income earned, in the fiat currency used to express rates for the account

fees.description: Total amount of fees paid on income transactions, in the fiat currency used to express rates for the account

start_date.description: The start date of the month/year rollup in UTC, inclusive

end_date.description: The end date of the month/year rollup in UTC, exclusive (may be in the future)

get.summary: Aggregate income data for a given time period

post.description: Create a portfolio statement and/or transaction summary document for a user.

parameters.description: User UUID.
parameters.name: x-user-id

country_code.description: Country the user is subject to taxes.

end_date.description: ISO-8601 formatted date as an end time.

fiat_holdings.description: Fiat holdings for user to include in a portfolio statement.

ending_amount.description: Amount of Fiat Asset holdings at end_date.

starting_amount.description: Amount of Fiat Asset holdings at start_date.

start_date.description: ISO-8601 formatted date as a start time.

created_date.description: ISO-8601 formatted date for the document creation timestamp.

end_date.description: ISO-8601 formatted date document end timestamp.

start_date.description: ISO-8601 formatted date for the document start timestamp.

get.description: Retrieve an array of portfolio statements and/or transaction summaries document of a user.

parameters.description: User UUID.
parameters.name: x-user-id

get.description: Retrieve a portfolio statement and/or transaction summary document of a user.

parameters.description: Document UUID.

get.description: Retrieve a comprehensive snapshot of form item totals specific to a defined document_type. This API provides total row count, total proceeds, and total cost basis for the specified document type between a start and end date or a start and end disposed date. Only either of the date filters can be used.

parameters.name: start_date

schema.description: ISO-8601 formatted date for the filter start date.

parameters.description: Start date for filtering form-items.

parameters.name: end_date

schema.description: ISO-8601 formatted date for the filter end date.

parameters.description: End date for filtering form-items.

parameters.name: start_disposed_date

schema.description: ISO-8601 formatted date for the filter start disposed date.

parameters.description: Start disposed date for filtering form-items.

parameters.name: end_disposed_date

schema.description: ISO-8601 formatted date for the filter end disposed date.

parameters.description: End disposed date for filtering form-items.

parameters.name: document_type
parameters.description: The document for which the form item data totals will be retrieved.

document_type.description: Type of the tax document the form data is for which will help decide the fields we will return.

cost_basis.description: Total cost basis for the form-items.

message.example: Property start_date/end_date must be in the ISO-8601 format/start_date cannot be after the end_date/end_date cannot be in the future/document_type must be a valid document type

get.description: Get a summary and list of undisposed lots for the given asset for a specific account.

parameters.name: account_id
parameters.description: Your system's unique identifier for the Account

parameters.name: x-user-id
parameters.description: The TaxBit UUID of the account. Ignored if account_id is specified.

parameters.name: asset_id
parameters.description: The TaxBit UUID of the asset.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset for paging through results. Default is 0.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of results to return. Default is 25.

parameters.name: include_summary
parameters.description: If true, the summary for the asset will be included in the response. Default is true.

parameters.name: price
parameters.description: The current price of the asset. If provided, unrealized gains data will be returned.

data.description: The unrealized lots the account owns. Summary data will be provided if include_summary was set to true.

allOf.description: The asset referenced by all `quantity` fields.
The asset referenced by all `cost` fields. Not present if all lots are missing cost basis.
Overview of the asset owned by the account. Includes unrealized gains data if price is provided. Not present if include_summary was set to false.
Contains quantity and cost aggregate data for the asset.

total_quantity.description: Total amount of the asset owned.

total_quantity_with_cost_basis.description: Total amount of the asset owned that has known cost basis.

total_cost.description: Sum of all cost bases of the asset's lots in the fiat asset. '0' if all lots are missing cost basis.

average_unit_cost.description: Average cost of each unit of the asset.

total_quantity_missing_cost_basis.description: The total amount of assets for which the cost basis is missing. This is not applicable if there are no lots with missing cost basis.

total_current_value.description: If the `price` query param is provided, the current value of the owned asset, including lots missing cost basis.

total_unrealized_gain_loss.description: If the `price` query param is provided, the gain or loss that would be realized by selling all lots of the asset.

percent_unrealized_gain_loss.description: If the `price` query param is provided, the percent profit (or loss) that would be realized by selling all lots of the asset.

went_negative.description: Indicates that one or more of the dispositions of the specified asset caused the user's inventory to go negative. This typically implies either the disposition quantity was wrong, or a previous aquisition was never sent to TaxBit. This field will be omitted if not true.

lots.description: Array of lots owned by the account. Supports paging.

acquisition_datetime.description: ISO-8601 timestamp representing when the lot was acquired.

term.description: Describes how long the lot has been held. Short term lots have been held for less than a year, long term lots have been held for a year or longer.

quantity.description: Amount of the asset left in the lot.

fiat_asset_code.description: Code of the fiat asset referenced by any `cost` field

cost.description: Cost basis of the lot. Not present if the lot is missing cost basis.

unit_cost.description: Cost per unit of the asset of the asset in the lot. Not present if the lot is missing cost basis.

current_value.description: If the `price` param is provided, the value of the lot if sold at that price.

unrealized_gain_loss.description: If the `price` param is provided, the gain or loss that would be realized if the lot was sold at that price.

percent_unrealized_gain_loss.description: If the `price` param is provided, the percent profit or loss that would be realized if the lot was sold at that price.

missing_cost_basis.description: Indicates that there is no cost basis provided for the specified lot. By default, lots created from transfers will be missing cost basis.

get.summary: Inventory Lots and Summary for a Single Asset

get.description: Retrieve the summary of total cost and total quantity for each undisposed asset for a specified account.

parameters.name: account_id
parameters.description: Your system's unique identifier for the Account

parameters.name: x-user-id
parameters.description: The TaxBit UUID of the account. Ignored if account_id is specified.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset for paging through results. Default is 0.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of results to return. Default is 25.

data.description: Array of inventory summary objects, 1 per asset owned.

allOf.description: The asset referenced by any `quantity` fields.
The fiat asset referenced by any `cost` fields. Not present if all lots owned by the account are missing cost basis.

summary.description: Contains aggregate (average and totals) quantity and cost data for the asset.

total_quantity.description: Total amount of the asset owned

total_quantity_with_cost_basis.description: Total amount of the asset owned that has known cost basis. If all lots are missing cost basis, this value is 0.

total_cost.description: Sum of all cost bases of the asset's lots in the fiat asset. '0' if all lots are missing cost basis.

average_unit_cost.description: Average cost of each unit of the asset.

total_quantity_missing_cost_basis.description: Total amount of the asset owned that is missing cost basis. Not present if no lots are missing cost basis.

went_negative.description: Indicates that one or more of the dispositions of the specified asset caused the user's inventory to go negative. This typically implies either the disposition quantity was wrong, or a previous aquisition was never sent to TaxBit. This field will be omitted if not true.

get.summary: List Inventory Summary for all Assets

post.summary: Validate a US TIN and name
post.description: Send a US TIN and name for validation

parameters.name: use_async
parameters.description: Whether to process the request asynchronously. Passing true will minimize the response time of this call. When this option is chosen, a status of "pending" will be returned immediately. The final validation result can be accessed via the GET endpoint or webhook once the processing is complete.

legal_name.description: The legal name of the person or entity to validate

tin.description: The US issued Tax Identification Number
The US issued Tax Identification Number

status.description:
The status of the US TIN validation request:
* `PENDING`: The request is pending validation, either due to it being an asynchronous request or the validation could not be completed
* `VALID_SSN_MATCH`: The US TIN is a valid SSN and matches the legal name
* `VALID_EIN_MATCH`: The US TIN is a valid EIN and matches the legal name
* `VALID_SSN_EIN_MATCH`: The US TIN is a valid SSN and EIN and matches the legal name
* `MISMATCH`: The US TIN does not match the legal name
* `TIN_NOT_ISSUED`: The provided US TIN has not been issued

validation_date.description: The date and time that the US TIN validation result was received from the IRS

get.description: Retrieves the validation result for a previously submitted US TIN and name combination using its US TIN validation ID.

schema.description: The unique identifier for the US TIN validation request, provided in the POST response

parameters.name: unmask_tin
parameters.description: Whether to unmask the Tax Identification Number (TIN) in the response; defaults to false

payer_name.description: The name of the Payer/Filer entity.

tenant_id.description: The Payer's tenant UUID. This is a version 4 UUID.
